title: Fupre Chess Analytics
description: Problem: scattered player records and ratings. Solution: a lightweight web app to register players, record results, and generate player ratings. Impact: faster tournament ops, clean export to CSV/JSON.

title: Fupre Chess Club

title: Proudcore
description: Proudcore is a professional solar and inverter company providing reliable installation, maintenance, and energy optimization services. The website showcases its range of solar panels, inverters, and sustainable power systems designed to help homes and businesses achieve energy independence and reduce electricity costs.
